atten2.ptxt: Wear protective gloves. Sharp areas on the parts may injure your hands.

item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT CUSHION EDGE PROTECTOR LH

s2.ptxt: Install the seat cushion edge protector.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RECLINING ADJUSTER LOWER ARM SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: w/ Vertical Adjuster:
Using a T40 "TORX" socket wrench, install the reclining adjuster lower arm with the 2 "TORX" bolts.
w/o Vertical Adjuster:
Install the reclining adjuster lower arm with the 3 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RECLINING ADJUSTER LOWER ARM SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: w/ Vertical Adjuster:

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: w/o Vertical Adjuster:

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT ADJUSTER ROD (w/ Vertical Adjuster)

s2.ptxt: Install the front seat adjuster rod with the 2 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEAT TRACK HANDLE SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Attach the spring of the seat track in the order shown in the illustration to install the handle.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL VERTICAL ADJUSTING SHAFT SUB-ASSEMBLY (w/ Vertical Adjuster)

s2.ptxt: Install the vertical adjusting shaft to the reclining adjuster lower arm with 2 new E-rings.
Temporarily install the vertical seat adjuster knob.
Turn the knob as much as possible in the direction indicated by arrow A in the illustration.
Mesh the gear of the vertical adjusting shaft with the gear of the reclining adjuster lower arm.
Align the holes of the adjusting shaft and adjusting arm by turning the knob in the direction indicated by arrow B in the illustration.
Remove the vertical seat adjuster knob.
Install the spring as shown in the illustration.
Using pliers, push together the tabs that hold the spring.
Using a 6 mm socket hexagon wrench, install the front seat No. 2 adjuster pin.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT CUSHION FRAME SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Install the cushion frame with the 4 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEPARATE TYPE FRONT SEAT CUSHION COVER

s2.ptxt: for Normal Seat:
Using hog ring pliers, install the seat cushion cover to the seat cushion pad with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: for Leather Seat:
Using hog ring pliers, install the seat cushion cover to the seat cushion pad with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT CUSHION PROTECTOR

s2.ptxt: Install the 2 protectors.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEAT CUSHION COVER WITH PAD

s2.ptxt: Set the seat cushion cover with pad in place.
Using hog ring pliers, install the seat cushion cover with pad with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Attach the hooks in the hook area shown in the illustration.
Attach the 2 hooks.
w/ Occupant Detection Sensor:
Attach the wire harness clamp.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEPARATE TYPE FRONT SEATBACK PAD

s2.ptxt: Install the seatback pad.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEPARATE TYPE FRONT SEATBACK COVER

s2.ptxt: Using hog ring pliers, attach the 2 straps of the seatback cover to the seatback pad with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws to install the 2 headrest supports.
Using hog ring pliers, install the upper part of the seatback cover to the seatback pad with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: for Normal Seat:
Using hog ring pliers, install the center of the seatback cover to the seatback pad with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: for Leather Seat:
Using hog ring pliers, install the center of the seatback cover to the seatback pad with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Using hog ring pliers, attach the 2 straps of the seatback cover to the seatback spring with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Using hog ring pliers, attach the wires at the bottom of the seatback cover with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEPARATE TYPE FRONT SEATBACK ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Install the seatback with the 4 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEATBACK SPRING

s2.ptxt: Install the seatback spring.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT CUSHION SHIELD LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the claw, and then attach the rear part of the cushion shield in the order shown in the illustration to install the cushion shield.
Install the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RECLINING ADJUSTER RELEASE HANDLE LH

s2.ptxt: Install the release handle.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT CUSHION INNER SHIELD LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the rear part of the inner shield in the order shown in the illustration to install the cushion shield.
Install the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL VERTICAL SEAT ADJUSTER KNOB LH (w/ Vertical Adjuster)

s2.ptxt: Install the knob with the snap ring.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT CUSHION COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Install the seat cushion cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Install the front seat inner belt assembly RH with the nut.

atten3.ptxt: Do not overlap the anchor part of the front seat inner belt assembly LH and protruding part of the front seat cushion frame sub-assembly LH.

s2.ptxt: w/ Driver Seat Belt Warning Light:

s3.ptxt: Attach the wire harness to the clamp.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY RH (for Front Passenger Side)

s2.ptxt: Install the front seat inner belt assembly RH with the nut.

atten3.ptxt: Do not overlap the anchor part of the front seat inner belt assembly RH and protruding part of the front seat cushion frame sub-assembly RH.

s2.ptxt: Attach the wire harness to the clamp.
w/ Passenger Seat Belt Warning Light:

s3.ptxt: Connect the connector and attach the 2 clamps as shown in the illustration.
